title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“From its rich nappa leather and pigskin lining to its supple comfort, the Prestige tennis shoe spoils your feet.” [From an advertisement by Prince in The New Yorker, 30 June 1986:47.]
